parameters.Name: brand_name
parameters.Description: The brand name of the packaged product.

parameters.Name: description
parameters.Description: A description of the product recalled.

parameters.Name: recalling_firm
parameters.Description: The company that issued the recall.

parameters.Name: pack_size
parameters.Description: The size of the package recalled.

parameters.Name: codes
parameters.Description: Identifying details about the product recalled.

parameters.Name: upc_code
parameters.Description: The UPC code from the product's packaging.

parameters.Name: label
parameters.Description: A link to an image of the label.

parameters.Name: $select
parameters.Description: The SELECT portion of a SoQL query.

parameters.Name: $where
parameters.Description: The WHERE portion of a SoQL query.

parameters.Name: $group
parameters.Description: The GROUP BY portion of a SoQL query.

parameters.Name: $limit
parameters.Description: Limit the results to a specified number. The maximum that will be returned at any time is 500 records.

parameters.Name: $offset
parameters.Description: Start the results after a given offset. Used for paging.

parameters.Name: $q
parameters.Description: Perform a full-text search in the data.
